title: Plants
createEnvironmentFirst: Create an environment first, then add your plants!

form.geneticLineagePlaceholder: e.g., Northern Lights x Big Bud
form.noMotherPlantsFound: No mother plants found. Showing all plants as options.
form.manualParentPlaceholder: e.g., Clone from dispensary, friend's plant
form.motherPlantHint: Mother plants can be used to create clones and cuttings
form.sourceLabPlaceholder: e.g., TC lab name, research facility
form.createGeneticFirst: Add genetics to your library first
form.selectGeneticSubtitle: Choose from your saved seed genetics

detail.harvestRequired: Harvest required before moving to Drying
detail.collectDryWeight: Moving to Curing will collect dry weight & waste info
detail.archivedOn: This plant was archived on {{date}}. You can view it from related harvest records.
detail.createEnvironmentFirst: Create an environment first before adding plants
detail.noPlantsInEnvironment: No plants in this environment yet

clone.title: Clone Plant
clone.noEnvironmentsAvailable: No environments available. Create one first.
clone.hint: Clones will have control numbers starting with "CL", inherit genetic info, and won't include watering logs.

archive.title: Archive Plant
archive.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to archive this plant? The plant will be hidden from your list but can still be accessed from related harvest records.

harvest.harvestRequiredMessage: You need to harvest this plant before moving to the Drying stage. This records the wet weight and other harvest details.
harvest.moveToDryingMessage: This plant has been harvested. Update stage to Drying and set harvest status to "drying"?
harvest.noHarvestFoundMessage: You need to harvest and dry this plant before moving to the Curing stage.
harvest.dryingRequiredMessage: The harvest needs to be in the Drying stage before moving to Curing. Please update the harvest status first.
harvest.enterDryWeight: Enter the dry weight after drying. This will calculate the drying loss and update the harvest record.
harvest.wasteNotesPlaceholder: Any notes about the drying process, waste, etc.
